description: This header file defines the interface for the 'ssp_messagebus' component, including function declarations for engaging with the message bus, initialization, finalization, bus checking, and resource freeing, along with header guards. It includes licensing information, licensing terms, and a brief description, indicating it provides interface definitions related to message bus operations.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user-specific data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the message bus interface with user-specific data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status or health of the message bus with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, given a priority and user data.
